sentence: "The Republican National Committee hereby formally censures Representatives Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois and shall immediately cease any and all support of them as members of the Republican Party for their behavior, which has been destructive to the institution of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Republican Party and our republic, and is inconsistent with the position of the conference," read the resolution, which was obtained by NBC News.
title: At RNC gathering, rift emerges between Trump's interests and the party's

sentence: On Friday, the Republican National Committee referred to the Jan. 6 riot as legitimate political discourse? in a resolution to censure two congressional Republicans who voted for Trump's impeachment, Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois.
title: DeSantis refuses to take sides in Trump-Pence clash as 2024 speculation grows

sentence: As Vanity Fair reported last month, Thiel hosted a January fundraiser at his Miami compound for Wyoming Republican Harriet Hageman, the Trumpbacked candidate running a primary challenge against Liz Cheney after Cheney refused to endorse Trump's big lie? and voted to impeach him.
author: Caleb Ecarma
title: Peter Thiel Is MAGA's Big Money Man
